text: I'm having issues obtaining the personal access key for the CMS. I have a new account and began the beginner guide on the HubSpot website but got stuck on step 2.1, when I enter `hs init` in the cli and proceed to the website and login it continuously loops me back to the login. I did a bit of digging on the web and found <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Unable-to-Get-Personal-CMS-Access-Key/td-p/462455|this 2 day old post> from a user experiencing the same issue but none of the suggested fixes have worked for me

Does anyone know how to add a caption to an image when adding an image within a Rich Text field? There doesn't seem to be a way to accomplish this unless I'm missing something. I know you can create a module and use a text field for the caption, but we want to be able to use this within the rich text editor.
<@U01UD8W2CLV> I use JS to grab the alt text from the image and use it for the caption
